name: Koibito no Nazo: Lover's Enigma
storyline: You play as a woman in her late 20's, struggling with the responsibility of balancing the intricacies of your relationships and your own mental stability, whilst also seeking the truth behind the mysterious death of your husband. You must navigate through a web of secrets involving a mysterious cult, personal traumas, and complex relationships. As you uncover clues and interact with a cast of intriguing characters, including the charismatic yet enigmatic streamer Ren, and the supportive yet distant Ryota, you must balance your sanity and emotions to piece together the truth. Your decisions shape the narrative, leading to multiple endings that reflect the consequences of your choices. Dive into this immersive visual novel to unravel the enigma and discover the hidden truths of "Lover's Enigma."
summary: In Lover's Enigma , you investigate your husband's mysterious death while balancing complex relationships and personal trauma. Navigate a web of secrets involving a hidden cult and key characters. Your choices shape the story and lead to multiple endings.
